amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute expresses the sense of the Congress that the Government of the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia and its President, Slobodan Milosevic, should release the three detained U.S. servicemen and abide by the Geneva Conventions regarding the treatment of both prisoners of war and civilians.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike all after the resolving clause and insert a new text.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Gilman.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gilman amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
